name: Wizard
title: Wizard

feature_defs.trigger: when you finish a short rest
effects: replace one prepared wizard spell of level 1 or higher with another wizard spell from your spellbook
limits: the new spell must be of a level for which you have spell slots
the replaced spell must be of level 1 or higher
notes: This feature does not allow changing cantrips.

effects: choose one 1st-level wizard spell and one 2nd-level wizard spell that you have prepared
you can cast each of the chosen spells at will without expending a spell slot
limits: both spells must have a casting time of 1 action
you can change the chosen spells when you finish a long rest
notes: Casting these spells at higher levels still requires spell slots.

effects: choose two 3rd-level wizard spells in your spellbook
you can cast each chosen spell once without expending a spell slot
when you cast a chosen spell using this feature, it is cast at 3rd level
limits: you regain the ability to cast each spell for free when you finish a short or long rest

notes: Wizard spell slot progression is defined in the class table and referenced by spellcasting rules.
Arcane Recovery remains a core resource and is not duplicated here.
Spell Mastery and Signature Spells explicitly restrict eligible spells to those with a 1-action casting time.
